TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GrammarBuilder extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供机制以便以编程方式为语音识别语法生成约束。

span.span: Provides a mechanism for programmatically building the constraints for a speech recognition grammar.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类的实例还可以通过隐式转换获取，也可以通过将 对象与另一个对象组合到新的来获取 。Instances of this class can also be obtained by implicit conversions from other classes or by combining a object with a second object to from a new . 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 方法。For more information, see the and methods. 若要向现有添加约束，请 使用 、 、 、 、和 方法以及 运算符。To add constraints to an existing , use the , , , , and methods, and the operator. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当使用的语音识别语法包含具有相同键名或多个可重复修改同一语义元素的值的语义元素时，语音识别器会引发异常。The speech recognizer can throw an exception when using a speech recognition grammar that contains duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the value of the same semantic element. 有关生成和使用语音识别语法的详细信息，请参阅 [语音识别](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361633(v=office.14))。For more information about building and using speech recognition grammars, see [Speech Recognition](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361633(v=office.14)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 静态 方法提供了另一种机制，通过该机制可以将各种类型组合起来，从而在使用生成的语法中创建多样性和灵活性 。The static methods provide another mechanism by which you can combine various types to create diversity and flexibility in grammars built with . 这些方法对应于静态 方法，这些方法也是在类上定义的 。These methods correspond to the static methods, which are also defined on the class. 参数的顺序决定了元素在新中的顺序 。The order of the parameters determines the order of the elements in the new . 还可以从 、 、 和[字符串](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=159733)对象中获取。A can also be obtained from , , , and [String](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=159733) objects. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 运算符。For more information, see the and operators. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当使用的语音识别语法包含具有相同键名或多个可重复修改同一语义元素的值的语义元素时，语音识别器会引发异常。The speech recognizer can throw an exception when using a speech recognition grammar that contains duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the value of the same semantic element. 有关生成和使用语音识别语法的详细信息，请参阅 [语音识别](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361633(v=office.14))。For more information about building and using speech recognition grammars, see [Speech Recognition](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361633(v=office.14)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持从以下类进行隐式转换： supports implicit conversions from the following classes: - - - - 此方法接受上面列出的参数的对象 `builder` 。This method accepts the objects listed above for the `builder` parameter. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 运算符。For more information, see the and operators. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在组合 和 包含或实例的对象时 ，请确保避免使用相同的键名或多个可重复修改对象属性的语义元素创建重复的语义元素 。When you combine and objects that contain or instances, make sure you avoid creating duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the property of a object. 语音识别器在遇到这些情况时可能会引发异常。The speech recognizer can throw an exception if it encounters these circumstances. 有关生成包含语义信息的语音识别语法的详细信息，请参阅 [向 GrammarBuilder 语法添加语义](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh361581.aspx)。For more information about building a speech recognition grammar that contains semantic information, see [Add Semantics to a GrammarBuilder Grammar](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh361581.aspx).

summary.span: 为语法元素的当前顺序追加语法元素。

span.span: Appends a grammar element to the current sequence of grammar elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用这些方法可将语法元素追加到现有 。Use these methods to append grammar elements to an existing . 创建语法元素时，可以将它们追加到现有生成器，以渐进式地开发语音识别语法的约束。As you create grammar elements, you can append them to the existing builder to progressively develop the constraints for a speech recognition grammar. 每个元素都添加到当前元素序列的末尾。Each element is added to the end of the current sequence of elements. 此方法的重载用于追加 、 、 、 和 对象。This method has overloads for appending , , , , and objects. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当使用的语音识别语法包含具有相同键名或多个可重复修改同一语义元素的值的语义元素时，语音识别器会引发异常。The speech recognizer can throw an exception when using a speech recognition grammar that contains duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the value of the same semantic element. 有关生成和使用语音识别语法的详细信息，请参阅 [语音识别](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361633(v=office.14))。For more information about building and using speech recognition grammars, see [Speech Recognition](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361633(v=office.14)).

summary.span: 为语法元素的当前顺序追加语法文件或语法规则。

span.span: Appends a grammar file or a grammar rule to the current sequence of grammar elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以将语法文件或语法规则附加到文件中。The methods can append a grammar file or a grammar rule from a file. 这些方法允许应用程序使用预先部署或可公开使用的语法规则。These methods allow applications to make use of pre-deployed or publicly available grammar rules. 应用程序必须对指定语法文件的位置具有读取访问权限。The application must have read access to the location of specified grammar files. 这些方法可以从以下格式读取语音识别语法。These methods can read a speech recognition grammar from the following formats. - 符合 W3C[语音识别语法规范 (SRGS) 版本 1.0](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)的 XML 格式文件XML-format files that conform to the W3C [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761) - 符合 Microsoft 语音识别语法二进制格式 ( cfg 文件扩展名的二进制文件) Binary files that conform to the Microsoft Speech Recognition Grammar Binary Format (.cfg file extension) 使用扩展名为的二进制语法文件将 XML 格式的 SRGS 语法文件编译为二进制语法文件可以减少搜索匹配所用的时间，尤其是当语法要求识别大量字词和短语时。Compiling an XML-format SRGS grammar file to a binary grammar file with the .cfg extension can reduce the time consumed by searches for a match, especially if the grammar requires recognition of a large number of words and phrases. 有关将 SRGS 语法编译为 CFG 二进制格式的信息，请参阅 。For information about compiling SRGS grammars to the CFG binary format, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public void AppendRuleReference (string path);
.method public hidebysig instance void AppendRuleReference(string path) cil managed
Public Sub AppendRuleReference (path As String)
public: void AppendRuleReference(System::String ^ path);
member this.AppendRuleReference : string -> unit

param.name: path
param.span: 在一个支持的布局描述语音识别语法的路径通用资源标识符（URI）的文件。

span.span: The path or Universal Resource Identifier (URI) of the file that describes a speech recognition grammar in a supported format.

summary.span: 为语法元素的当前顺序追加语法定义文件。

span.span: Appends a grammar definition file to the current sequence of grammar elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数提供的 URI `path` 可以是本地的，也可以是远程的。The URI provided by the `path` argument may be local or remote. 应用程序必须对指定语法文件的位置具有读取访问权限。The application must have read access to the location of specified grammar files. W3C 语音识别语法规范 (SRGS) 表示形式可以定义根规则。A W3C Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) representation can define a root rule. 此方法将语法从其根规则开始追加到语法元素的当前序列。This method appends the grammar, beginning with its root rule, to the current sequence of grammar elements. 若要追加特定语法规则，请使用 方法。To append a specific grammar rule, use the method. ## Examples 下面的 c # 示例将创建一个语音识别语法，该语法使用 `Cities` 本地 SRGS 文件 grxml 中名为的规则。The following C# example creates a speech recognition grammar that uses the rule named `Cities` in a local SRGS file, cities.grxml. 下面的 c # 代码示例中将显示 grxml 文件的内容。The content of the cities.grxml file appears below the C# code example. ```csharp private static Grammar CreateCitiesGrammar1() { GrammarBuilder builder = new GrammarBuilder(); builder.AppendRuleReference("file://c:/temp/cities.grxml"); Grammar citiesGrammar = new Grammar(builder); citiesGrammar.Name = "Cities Grammar 1"; return citiesGrammar; } ``` ```xml I would like to fly from to Seattle Los Angeles New York Miami ```

MemberSignature.Value: public void AppendRuleReference (string path, string rule);
.method public hidebysig instance void AppendRuleReference(string path, string rule) cil managed
Public Sub AppendRuleReference (path As String, rule As String)
public: void AppendRuleReference(System::String ^ path, System::String ^ rule);
member this.AppendRuleReference : string * string -> unit

param.name: path
param.span: 在一个支持的布局描述语音识别语法的路径通用资源标识符（URI）的文件路径。

span.span: The file path or Universal Resource Identifier (URI) of the file that describes a speech recognition grammar in a supported format.

param.name: rule
param.span: 规则的追加、或追加语法文件的默认根规则的标识符 。

span.span: The identifier of the rule to append, or to append the default root rule of the grammar file.

summary.span: 为语法元素的当前顺序追加指定的语法定义文件规则。

span.span: Appends the specified rule of a grammar definition file to the current sequence of grammar elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数提供的 URI `path` 可以是本地的，也可以是远程的。The URI provided by the `path` argument may be local or remote. 应用程序必须对指定语法文件的位置具有读取访问权限。The application must have read access to the location of specified grammar files. 您可以使用 方法来追加语法文件（以其根规则开头）。You can use the use the method to append a grammar file beginning with its root rule. ## Examples 下面的 c # 示例将创建一个语音识别语法，该语法使用 `Cities` 本地 SRGS 文件 grxml 中名为的规则。The following C# example creates a speech recognition grammar that uses the rule named `Cities` in a local SRGS file, cities.grxml. 下面的 c # 代码示例中将显示 grxml 文件的内容。The content of the cities.grxml file appears below the C# code example. ```csharp private static Grammar CreateCitiesGrammar2() { GrammarBuilder builder = new GrammarBuilder(); builder.Append("Does"); builder.AppendRuleReference(@"c:\temp\cities.grxml", "Cities"); builder.Append("have a shuttle"); Grammar citiesGrammar = new Grammar(builder); citiesGrammar.Name = "Cities Grammar 2"; return citiesGrammar; } ``` ```xml I would like to fly from to Seattle Los Angeles New York Miami ```

span.span: Create Grammars Using GrammarBuilder

summary.span: 创建对应于两个语法元素序列的新 。

span.span: Creates a new that corresponds to a sequence of two grammar elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 操作数的顺序决定了元素在新中的顺序 。The order of the operands determines the order of the elements in the new . > [!IMPORTANT] > 将 或 包含 或实例的对象 与其他语法元素组合在一起时，建议使用警告。Caution is recommended when combining or objects that contain or instances with other grammar elements. 当使用的语音识别语法包含具有相同键名或多个可重复修改同一语义元素的值的语义元素时，语音识别器会引发异常。The speech recognizer can throw an exception when using a speech recognition grammar that contains duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the value of the same semantic element. 有关生成和使用语音识别语法的详细信息，请参阅 [语音识别](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361633(v=office.14))。For more information about building and using speech recognition grammars, see [Speech Recognition](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361633(v=office.14)).
